lobbysettings.title: ورودی تنظیمات
lobbysettings.gamehostonly: فقط میزبان بازی میتواند این را تغییر دهد!
lobbysettings.inlobbyonly: تو فقط میتوانی این را در ورودی تغییر دهی!
lobbysettings.visiononly: مردم را فقط در نگاه بشنوید
lobbysettings.comms_sabotage_audio: خراب کردن رابطه ی صدای غیر فعال
lobbysettings.ghost_only_warning: این صدا را برای پخش کننده های زنده غیر فعال میکند.
lobbysettings.meetings_only_warning: This disables the sound for alive players outside meetings.

public_lobby.title: Title
public_lobby.enable_warning: Enabling this will make your lobby public to other BetterCrewLink users!
public_lobby.ban_warning: Inappropriate text will result in a ban from BetterCrewLink.

audio.title: Audio
audio.speaker: Speaker
audio.microphone_sens_warning: If you set the sensitivity any lower it might not work.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.nat_fix_warning: This will FIX the NAT issues but will add a delay since it is using a server instead of Peer to Peer (P2P).
advanced.voice_server_warning: This option is for advanced users only. Other servers can steal your info or crash BetterCrewLink.

beta.title: BETA/DEBUG
beta.hardware_acceleration_warning: This disables Hardware Acceleration (which can increase CPU usage)
beta.vad_enabled_warning: You won't see who's talking if disabled.
beta.oldsampledebug_warning: This is a test function ONLY enabled when asked.

streaming.title: Streaming Settings
streaming.voice_server_comp_warning: It is recommended to just change the voice server to a BetterCrewLink Voice Server (https://bettercrewl.ink) for example.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.restore_warning: This will reset ALL settings to their default values.
troubleshooting.warning: Not available as host in game!

game.error_admin:
Couldn't connect to Among Us.
Please re-open BetterCrewLink as Administrator.
game.error_unsupport: Your version of Among Us is unsupported by BetterCrewLink.
